snippets.title: HubService listHubs Sample
snippets.description: Lists the Network Connectivity Center hubs associated with a given project.

snippets.title: HubService getHub Sample
snippets.description: Gets details about a Network Connectivity Center hub.

snippets.title: HubService createHub Sample
snippets.description: Creates a new Network Connectivity Center hub in the specified project.

snippets.title: HubService updateHub Sample
snippets.description: Updates the description and/or labels of a Network Connectivity Center hub.

snippets.title: HubService deleteHub Sample
snippets.description: Deletes a Network Connectivity Center hub.

snippets.title: HubService listHubSpokes Sample
snippets.description: Lists the Network Connectivity Center spokes associated with a specified hub and location. The list includes both spokes that are attached to the hub and spokes that have been proposed but not yet accepted.

snippets.title: HubService queryHubStatus Sample
snippets.description: Query the Private Service Connect propagation status of a Network Connectivity Center hub.

snippets.title: HubService listSpokes Sample
snippets.description: Lists the Network Connectivity Center spokes in a specified project and location.

snippets.title: HubService getSpoke Sample
snippets.description: Gets details about a Network Connectivity Center spoke.

snippets.title: HubService createSpoke Sample
snippets.description: Creates a Network Connectivity Center spoke.

snippets.title: HubService updateSpoke Sample
snippets.description: Updates the parameters of a Network Connectivity Center spoke.

snippets.title: HubService rejectHubSpoke Sample
snippets.description: Rejects a Network Connectivity Center spoke from being attached to a hub. If the spoke was previously in the `ACTIVE` state, it transitions to the `INACTIVE` state and is no longer able to connect to other spokes that are attached to the hub.

snippets.title: HubService acceptHubSpoke Sample
snippets.description: Accepts a proposal to attach a Network Connectivity Center spoke to a hub.

snippets.title: HubService deleteSpoke Sample
snippets.description: Deletes a Network Connectivity Center spoke.

snippets.title: HubService getRouteTable Sample
snippets.description: Gets details about a Network Connectivity Center route table.

snippets.title: HubService getRoute Sample
snippets.description: Gets details about the specified route.

snippets.title: HubService listRoutes Sample
snippets.description: Lists routes in a given route table.

snippets.title: HubService listRouteTables Sample
snippets.description: Lists route tables in a given hub.

snippets.title: HubService getGroup Sample
snippets.description: Gets details about a Network Connectivity Center group.

snippets.title: HubService listGroups Sample
snippets.description: Lists groups in a given hub.

snippets.title: HubService updateGroup Sample
snippets.description: Updates the parameters of a Network Connectivity Center group.

snippets.title: HubService listPolicyBasedRoutes Sample
snippets.description: Lists PolicyBasedRoutes in a given project and location.

snippets.title: HubService getPolicyBasedRoute Sample
snippets.description: Gets details of a single PolicyBasedRoute.

snippets.title: HubService createPolicyBasedRoute Sample
snippets.description: Creates a new PolicyBasedRoute in a given project and location.

snippets.title: HubService deletePolicyBasedRoute Sample
snippets.description: Deletes a single PolicyBasedRoute.
